name: SAFA INDUSTRIAL GROUP
overview:
Safa Industrial Group is one the pioneer companies in regards to production, business and new industrial development plans establishment.

Safa Industrial Group is a holding company with subgroup companies in production fields, business and developing projects of modern industrial development. This group manages and makes policy for 7 production companies with overall covered area of 679,000 sqm plus 4 business companies and is one of the largest groups in private sector of Iran with more than 5000 staff.

Production companies managed by this group include: Saveh Rolling & Profile Mills Co., Safa Rolling & Pipe Mills Co., Ostad Industrial and Production Co., Amol Industrial Group Co., Kashan’s Amirkabir Steel Co., Safa Toos Rolling & Pipe Mills Co., and Soroosh Rey Co. with total annual production capacity of 4 million tons. These companies offer their products in three key market including energy, industrial construction and automotive.
